alert.note: Alert for Barnstable; Southern Bristol; Southern Plymouth (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued February 25 at 10:58AM EST until February 25 at 3:00PM EST by NWS Boston
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 PM EST THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow and Sleet. Snow and sleet accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...The south coasts of both Massachusetts and Rhode Island including Cape Cod. * WHEN...Until 3 PM EST this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Snow and sleet will result in difficult travel this morning. Mixed precipitation will change mainly to rain by late this morning with improving conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...A flash freeze is expected late this afternoon into early this evening as above freezing temperatures fall back into the 20s. A second round of mainly light snow late this afternoon and evening may result in renewed slippery travel.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling.
